name: Eonex d.o.o.
goal: EONEX specializes in the development of innovative and the manufacturing of high quality elements for the mechanical engineering industry and the manufacturing of medical implants (human and veterinary), surgical instruments and products in the field of aviation industry. To ensure a holistic service concept for our customers from different areas with product-specific requirements, all project phases can be carried out easily and at one site, from the planning and prototyping to series production and the testing of various types of products.
interests: Business and Industry, Education and training, Environment, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
Research and innovation
International cooperation and development
Design and development, production and distribution of surgical instruments, implants and medical devices
Design, manufacture and distribution of special purpose metal products and medical devices
Environment
